ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Xenobiologis (Playable Orkoids)
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.5.0.1 Adds plyable WH40k Orks Requires new start or a faction manager mod to have faction bases on the world map.
Contents Races: Orks - Humanlike Grots - Humanlike Snotlings - Animal Squigs - Animal
Apparel: Ork Armour Ork 'Eavy Armour Ork Mega Armour
Wargear: Stikkbomb Packs (Frag, Krak, Tankbusta)
Plants: Orkoid Fungus - the symbiotic fungus that is essential the orkoid ecosystem, it is a source of food, Squigs, Snotlings, Grots and Orks Orkoid Cocoons
Resources: Orkoid Fungus - a food
Mechanics: Symbiotic Fungus - All Orkoids originate from the same strain of fungal spores, which can mature into a might warboss, or a tiny mushroom.
